banner.message: This website uses cookies to improve your experience and to gain insight into website usage. By continuing, you accept our use of cookies. Read more in our cookie policy.

settings.title: Cookie Settings
settings.description: Here you can adjust your cookie preferences. You can choose which cookies to accept for each category.

necessary.title: Necessary cookies
necessary.description: These cookies are essential for the website to function and cannot be disabled.

statistics.title: Statistics cookies
statistics.description: These cookies help us understand how visitors use the website by collecting anonymous information.

marketing.title: Marketing cookies
marketing.description: These cookies are used to show visitors relevant advertisements and marketing campaigns.

what_are_cookies.title: What are cookies?
what_are_cookies.description: Cookies are small text files that are placed on your computer or mobile device when you visit a website. They are widely used to make websites work, or work more efficiently, as well as to provide information to the owners of the site.

necessary.description: These cookies are necessary for the proper functioning of our website. They cannot be disabled in our systems.
necessary.session: Session cookies for login and navigation
necessary.auth: Authentication cookies to keep you logged in

statistics.description: These cookies allow us to count visits and traffic sources so we can measure and improve the performance of our site.
statistics.usage: Usage data for improving our services

marketing.description: These cookies may be set through our site by our advertising partners to build a profile of your interests.

retention.title: How long do we keep cookies?
retention.description: The retention period of cookies varies by type. Session cookies are deleted when you close your browser. Persistent cookies remain on your device until they expire or are deleted by you. Our cookies typically have a retention period of 1 to 2 years.

manage.title: How can you manage your cookie preferences?
manage.description: You can change your cookie preferences at any time by returning to this page or by using the cookie settings available on our website.
manage.browser: You can also manage cookies through your browser settings. Most browsers allow you to refuse cookies or receive a warning before cookies are placed.
